title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enterprise-scale App Modernization with Agentic AI through TSRI's JANUS Studio
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过TSRI的JANUS Studio实现企业级应用现代化与智能体AI
abstract: Learn to build enterprise-scale generative AI applications focused on delivering business value. Learn essential practices for data governance, security, and scalability while implementing production-ready AI solutions. Gain practical experience with deployment frameworks, observability tools, and strategic approaches to accelerate AI adoption in enterprise environments.
abstract_cn: 学习构建企业级生成式AI应用程序，专注于交付业务价值。学习数据治理、安全性和可扩展性的基本实践，同时实施生产就绪的AI解决方案。通过部署框架、可观测性工具以及加速企业环境中AI采用的战略方法，获得实践经验。
